meta.description: Maximize profit from producing products A and B, considering byproduct C.

params.name: front_process_time
params.description: Time required for the front process per unit of product.

params.name: back_process_time
params.description: Time required for the back process per unit of product.

params.name: available_front_time
params.description: Total available time for the front process.

params.name: available_back_time
params.description: Total available time for the back process.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of product sold.

params.name: byproduct_profit
params.description: Profit per unit of byproduct sold.

params.name: disposal_cost
params.description: Cost per unit of byproduct disposed.

params.name: max_byproduct_sale
params.description: Maximum units of byproduct that can be sold.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from products and byproducts.

constraints.name: byproduct_sale_constraint
constraints.description: Maximum units of byproduct C that can be sold.

constraints.name: byproduct_production_constraint
constraints.description: Byproduct C produced is twice the units of product B.
